abstract: TNT Express has rejected a takeover bid from United Parcel Service that values the Dutch shipping company at $6.4 billion, but it says that talks are continuing.
snippet: TNT Express has rejected a takeover bid from United Parcel Service that values the Dutch shipping company at $6.4 billion, but it says that talks are continuing.
lead_paragraph: TNT Express said on Friday that it has rejected a takeover bid from the United Parcel Service valuing the the Dutch shipping company at about 4.89 billion euros, or $6.4 billion. But it added that talks were continuing.

headline.main: TNT Express Rejects Bid by U.P.S.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
